query:
SELECT 
  od.ano,
  COUNT(DISTINCT v.id) as total_videoaulas
FROM videoaulas v
LEFT JOIN ofertas_disciplinas od ON v.oferta_disciplina_id = od.id
GROUP BY od.ano
ORDER BY od.ano DESC;
